Suffering from "100+ day streak on Duolingo?"

Most platforms treat language learning as a task/chore/game in your free time. We treat it as if you moved to that language-speaking country.

Ditch the reading. Embrace the listening.

Apps have inflated the importance of reading as you get started. The first step to changing the way you think is making the 'uncomfortable' listening comfortable.

Adapt your learning to your life.

Most learning apps make you jump through countless lessons that do not pertain to you. Let's start learning what you can directly apply to your life right away.

Change the inner voice.

Don't learn to translate from your mother tongue. Embrace your different self as you speak a different inner language.
